alert.note: Alert for Middlesex; Somerset (New Jersey) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 14 at 6:56AM EDT until July 14 at 7:30AM EDT by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 730 AM EDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN SOMERSET AND MIDDLESEX COUNTIES... At 656 AM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Sayreville, or near Perth Amboy, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to roofs, siding, trees, and power lines is possible. Locations impacted include... New Brunswick, Perth Amboy, Somerset, Edison, Old Bridge, East Brunswick, Sayreville, North Brunswick, Matawan, Jamesburg, Colonia, Brownville, North Brunswick Township, Society Hill, Kendall Park, Dayton, Woodbridge, South Plainfield, South River and Highland Park. This includes the following highways... New Jersey Turnpike between exits 10 and 12. Interstate 287 in New Jersey between mile markers 0 and 6. Garden State Parkway between mile markers 121 and 134. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
